intro:
Rock the apocalypse in punk style!
Knight in shining armor, fight your way... with Guns!
description:
Get double the excitement and value with this Trash Punk bundle! Each game offers its own unique experience, and together, they provide hours of fun across different genres. 

This bundle includes:

1)Trash Punk: Dive into a post-apocalyptic world filled with danger, where you'll scavenge weapons and fight your way to survival in a wild, chaotic environment.

2)Knights & Guns: Take on waves of enemies in this arcade-inspired shooter, combining medieval knights with powerful guns in an exciting hand crafted fantasy world.
